query: query Continent($code: ID!) { continent(code: $code) { code countries { awsRegion capital code currencies currency emoji } name } }
query Continents($filter: ContinentFilterInput) { continents(filter: $filter) { code countries { awsRegion capital code currencies currency emoji } name } }
query Countries($filter: CountryFilterInput) { countries(filter: $filter) { awsRegion capital code currencies currency emoji emojiU } }
query Country($code: ID!) { country(code: $code) { awsRegion capital code currencies currency emoji emojiU } }
query Language($code: ID!) { language(code: $code) { code name native rtl } }
query Languages($filter: LanguageFilterInput) { languages(filter: $filter) { code name native rtl } }
